primary.name: Primary Blue
primary.usage: Main logo color, represents trust and healthcare

secondary.name: Caring Green
secondary.usage: Accent color, represents health and growth

accent.name: Warm Coral
accent.usage: Optional warm accent for heart element

main_logo.prompt_en: Modern minimalist logo for healthcare app called 'SRICARE'. Design features two stylized hands gently holding or supporting each other, forming a protective caring gesture. Clean vector style, soft blue color #4A90D9 as primary. The hands should look professional yet warm and approachable. Simple geometric shapes, no gradients, flat design suitable for mobile app icon. White background, high contrast, scalable design.
main_logo.prompt_id: Logo modern minimalis untuk aplikasi kesehatan bernama 'SRICARE'. Desain menampilkan dua tangan bergaya yang saling menopang atau mendukung, membentuk gestur peduli yang protektif. Gaya vektor bersih, warna biru lembut #4A90D9 sebagai warna utama. Tangan harus terlihat profesional namun hangat dan ramah. Bentuk geometris sederhana, tanpa gradien, desain flat cocok untuk ikon aplikasi mobile. Latar putih, kontras tinggi, desain scalable.

icon_only.prompt_en: Minimalist app icon for healthcare companion service. Two abstract hands forming a heart or protective circle shape. Soft blue #4A90D9 color. Clean geometric design, no text, suitable for 1024x1024 app store icon. Flat design, single color, white negative space. Professional medical feel but warm and caring.
icon_only.prompt_id: Ikon aplikasi minimalis untuk layanan pendamping kesehatan. Dua tangan abstrak membentuk bentuk hati atau lingkaran protektif. Warna biru lembut #4A90D9. Desain geometris bersih, tanpa teks, cocok untuk ikon app store 1024x1024. Desain flat, satu warna, ruang negatif putih.

full_logo_with_text.prompt_en: Complete logo design for 'SRICARE' healthcare app. Icon showing two stylized caring hands on the left, wordmark 'SRICARE' on the right in modern sans-serif font (similar to Inter or Poppins Bold). Primary blue #4A90D9 for icon, dark gray #2D3436 for text. Clean horizontal layout, professional healthcare branding, minimalist style.
full_logo_with_text.prompt_id: Desain logo lengkap untuk aplikasi kesehatan 'SRICARE'. Ikon menampilkan dua tangan peduli bergaya di sebelah kiri, wordmark 'SRICARE' di sebelah kanan dengan font sans-serif modern (mirip Inter atau Poppins Bold). Biru primer #4A90D9 untuk ikon, abu-abu gelap #2D3436 untuk teks. Layout horizontal bersih, branding kesehatan profesional, gaya minimalis.

stacked_logo.prompt_en: Stacked/vertical logo for 'SRICARE'. Caring hands icon on top, 'SRICARE' text below, tagline 'Caring hands, always near' at bottom in smaller text. Blue #4A90D9 icon, dark text. Centered alignment, clean spacing, suitable for splash screen or profile display.
stacked_logo.prompt_id: Logo bertumpuk/vertikal untuk 'SRICARE'. Ikon tangan peduli di atas, teks 'SRICARE' di bawahnya, tagline 'Tangan peduli, selalu dekat' di bagian bawah dengan teks lebih kecil. Ikon biru #4A90D9, teks gelap. Alignment tengah, spacing bersih, cocok untuk splash screen.

concept_1_heart_hands.prompt_en: Logo icon: Two hands coming together to form a heart shape. Minimalist line art style, soft blue #4A90D9. Single continuous line design. Modern healthcare app aesthetic. Clean white background.
concept_1_heart_hands.prompt_id: Ikon logo: Dua tangan bertemu membentuk bentuk hati. Gaya line art minimalis, biru lembut #4A90D9. Desain garis kontinu tunggal. Estetika aplikasi kesehatan modern. Latar putih bersih.

concept_2_protective_hands.prompt_en: Logo icon: One large hand gently cradling or protecting a smaller hand or human figure silhouette. Represents caregiving and protection. Soft blue #4A90D9, minimalist flat design, suitable for app icon.
concept_2_protective_hands.prompt_id: Ikon logo: Satu tangan besar dengan lembut menggendong atau melindungi tangan kecil atau siluet figur manusia. Merepresentasikan caregiving dan perlindungan. Biru lembut #4A90D9, desain flat minimalis.

concept_3_helping_hand.prompt_en: Logo icon: Single outstretched helping hand with a small plus/cross medical symbol. Clean vector style, blue #4A90D9. Represents healthcare assistance. Simple, memorable, scalable.
concept_3_helping_hand.prompt_id: Ikon logo: Satu tangan terulur membantu dengan simbol medis plus/silang kecil. Gaya vektor bersih, biru #4A90D9. Merepresentasikan bantuan kesehatan. Sederhana, mudah diingat, scalable.

concept_4_connected_hands.prompt_en: Logo icon: Two hands reaching toward each other, fingertips almost touching (like Michelangelo's Creation of Adam but simplified). Modern minimalist style, blue #4A90D9. Represents connection and care.
concept_4_connected_hands.prompt_id: Ikon logo: Dua tangan menggapai satu sama lain, ujung jari hampir menyentuh (seperti Creation of Adam Michelangelo tapi disederhanakan). Gaya minimalis modern, biru #4A90D9.

app_store_icon.prompt_en: Square app icon 1024x1024 pixels for iOS/Android app store. SRICARE healthcare companion app. Two stylized blue hands #4A90D9 forming caring gesture on white background. Rounded corners ready, high contrast, recognizable at small sizes. No text, icon only. Modern flat design.
app_store_icon.prompt_id: Ikon aplikasi persegi 1024x1024 piksel untuk app store iOS/Android. Aplikasi pendamping kesehatan SRICARE. Dua tangan biru bergaya #4A90D9 membentuk gestur peduli di latar putih. Siap sudut membulat, kontras tinggi, mudah dikenali di ukuran kecil. Tanpa teks, hanya ikon. Desain flat modern.

white_on_blue.prompt_en: SRICARE logo in white color on blue #4A90D9 background. Two caring hands icon with wordmark. Suitable for app header or branded materials.
white_on_blue.prompt_id: Logo SRICARE warna putih di latar biru #4A90D9. Ikon dua tangan peduli dengan wordmark. Cocok untuk header aplikasi atau material bermerek.

all_black.prompt_en: SRICARE logo in solid black #2D3436. Two caring hands icon with wordmark. For single color printing or watermarks.
all_black.prompt_id: Logo SRICARE dalam hitam solid #2D3436. Ikon dua tangan peduli dengan wordmark. Untuk cetak satu warna atau watermark.

do: Ensure scalability from 16px to large print
dont: Include medical crosses prominently (avoid clinical feel)

usage_examples.app_header: Icon only or horizontal logo, blue or white
